pacman.viewer

Class GUIViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • pacman.viewer.GUIViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInteraction, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GUIViewer
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements UserInteraction
    This is an implementation of the program viewer in a GUI window.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        This function shows a question to the user and wait for response.

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        maze - the the maze of the game
        Requires:

      • start

        public void start(Maze maze)
        Starts the game.
        Parameters:
        maze - the maze of the game

      • addPacman

        public void addPacman(Maze maze,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int index,
                      AbstractAlgorithm algorithm,
                      boolean isSelf,
                      boolean isNetwork)
        Adds a pacman agent into the gmae view.
        Parameters:
        maze - the the maze of the game
        x - the x coordinate of the pacman
        y - the y coordinate of the pacman
        index - the index of the pacman
        algorithm - the algorithm chosen for determining next move
        isSelf - if the agent is controlled by the local host user
        isNetwork - if the agent is controlled by the network side

      • addGhost

        public void addGhost(Maze maze,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     AbstractAlgorithm algorithm,
                     boolean isSelf,
                     boolean isNetwork)
        Adds a ghost agent into the gmae view.
        Parameters:
        maze - the the maze of the game
        x - the x coordinate of the ghost
        y - the y coordinate of the ghost
        name - the name of the ghost agent
        algorithm - the algorithm chosen for determining next move
        isSelf - if the agent is controlled by the local host user
        isNetwork - if the agent is controlled by the network side

        public int showResultDialog(java.lang.Boolean isLocalSideWin)
        This method gets called when the any side is lost.
        Parameters:
        isLocalSideWin - true if the remote side is lost and false otherwise. null if draw
        Returns:
        the user's choice.

      • updateConnectTo

        public void updateConnectTo(java.lang.String address,
                            int port)
        This function gets called when the controller connects to others and want to update the viewer. Normally for testing purpose.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the remote host
        port - the port of the remote host
